_xResult.title: Custom Suit with Tweed Jacket
_xResult.longdesc:
Sumissura is one of the world's top suitmakers for women, and Balodana can help you configure just about any type of suit. Just contact us and we can help you talk through the options and what will work best for your needs and your body fit preferences.

 

As an example, we configured this classic ladies burgundy suit with wide lapels and short blazer. Wear it from office to party and pair it with different accessories for each occasion. Crafted by our artisans from Tweed cloth, this slim-fit 2 button blazer features a wide peak lapel. The fully lined, flat-front pants with inclined side pockets and front zipper creates a classic suit for all occasions. Premium contrast lining on jacket, in burgundy.

 

Jacket configuration:

  • Style: single breasted, two buttons; short (hip) length; rounded hem; double vent back
  • Fit: Slim fit
  • Lapel: Wide, peak
  • Pockets: Slanted flap on sides, no breast pocket
  • Sleeves: two button
  • Lining: premium Branson
  • Brass buttons
  • Padded shoulders

 

Pants configuration:

  • Style: Long pants, slim fit, high rise
  • Fully lined pants (upgraded)
  • Flat front, no pleats
  • Closure: Centered button, Standard waistband, with belt loops
  • Front pockets: diagonal pockets
  • Back pockets: two back pockets, double welted with buttons

 

Fabric details
  • Outer fabric composition (blazer): 25% Wool & 75% Polyester
  • Outer fabric composition (pants): 80% Wool & 20% Terylene
  • Lining fabric composition: 55% Polyester & 45% Viscose
  • Dry clean only
